author: boudoul
body:
This Pull Request is setting up the geometry intended to be used for the TDR Namely Tilted Tracker + Pixel 4021
! THIS PR NEEDS an external file I just made the Pull Request in the external : 
https://github.com/cms-data/SLHCUpgradeSimulations-Geometry/pull/3

Details of this geometry were presented in UPS : https://indico.cern.ch/event/563122/contributions/2275415/attachments/1324245/1987214/trackerSim_160817.pdf

Some notes (@kpedro88 , @delaere ) 
- I created a D4 scenario which is a clone of D3, but with the new Tracker (T3) 
- The Numbering in the Pixel disks is fixed thanks to @atricomi
- warning : I didn't try at this point to change anything with repsect to the ongoing work from @ebrondol about the era migration - I can address this either in this PR or in a subsequent one (this one is already a big chunk of files so ..one thing at a time )
- The Digitizer algorithm can recognize the simhits depending on the location with Tracker (Pixel /Outer Tracker PS etc.. ) @suchandradutta 
- I have added the WF number 116XX to be tested in IB 

I ran also 108, 112 which are not supposed to be affected - seems fine but testing with a PR tests will help -
title: Phase2 Tracker Tilted + V4021 Pixels : Geometry and WFs up to Local Reco
